section.name: Introduction
section.p: This is the top-level entry point of the documentation bundle for the Tomcat 4 Servlet/JSP container. Tomcat 4 implements the Servlet 2.3 and JavaServer Pages 1.2 specifications from Java Software, and includes many additional features that make it a useful platform for developing and deploying web applications and web services.
Select one of the links from the navigation menu (to the left) to drill down to the more detailed documenation that is available. Each available manual is described in more detail below.

section.name: Getting Started
section.p: The following documents will assist you in downloading and installing Tomcat 4, and (if you wish to) building a distribution from the source code.

ul.li: README.txt - Describes the contents and directory structure of a Tomcat 4 binary distribution.
RUNNING.txt - Documents the steps necessary to download, install, start, and stop a Tomcat 4 server.
BUILDING.txt - Details the steps necessary to download Tomcat 4 source code (and the other packages that it depends on), and build a binary distribution from those sources.

section.name: Administrators
section.p: The following documents are aimed at System Administrators who are responsible for installing, configuring, and operating a Tomcat 4 server.

ul.li: Server Configuration Reference - Reference manual that documents all available elements and attributes that may be placed into a Tomcat 4 conf/server.xml file.

section.name: App Developers
section.p: The following documents are aimed at Application Developers who are constructing web applications or web services that will run on Tomcat.

ul.li: Application Developer's Guide - An introduction to the concepts of a web application as defined in the Servlet 2.3 Specification. Covers basic organization of your web application source tree, the structure of a web application archive, and an introduction to the web application deployment descriptor (/WEB-INF/web.xml).
Servlet/JSP Javadocs - The Servlet 2.3 and JSP 1.2 API Javadocs.

section.name: Tomcat Developers
section.p: The following documents are for Java developers who wish to contribute to the development of Tomcat itself, or to better understand its internal architecture and operation.

ul.li: Catalina Javadocs - Javadoc API documentation for the Catalina servlet container portion of Tomcat 4.
Jasper Javadocs - Javadoc API documentation for the Jasper JSP container portion of Tomcat 4.
